title: CryptopreneurBrainboss
author: CryptopreneurBrainboss
created_time: July 25, 2022, 07:30:12 PMLast edit: September 20, 2022, 01:33:04 AM by CryptopreneurBrainboss
content: Betplay.io: A FASTER CRYPTO CASINO that SUPPORTS BITCOIN LIGHTNING NETWORK is looking to hire approximately 25 active participates of the community to help spread the word about their casino through your signature ad space. If you believe to be qualify for this role, drop your application below and it'll be reviewed. Don't forget to visit Betplay's ANN thread to drop your review or know more about this casino.Rules and Requirements:• Applicants must have been very active in the last 30 days for your application to be considered valid.• Minimum of 5 merits in last 120 days before applying.• Wear our Signature & Avatar before or after acceptance into campaign.• Write a minimum of 25 constructive posts each week that you participate in campaign in order to receive payment.• Write a minimum of 10 constructive posts in the Gambling section each week in order to receive payment. These 10 gambling posts will count towards the 25 post Min weekly requirement.• Maximum of 7 posts (3 gambling posts included) will be eligible for daily post count.• Posts in Alternative Discussion boards, Off-Topic, Games and Rounds, any bounty/campaign threads as well as threads where your Signature isn't displayed will not count towards eligible posts.• Local boards are welcomed, only 5 out of the 25 minimum posts are eligible for locals.• Users with legitimate negative feedback from a DT member aren't allowed in campaign.• Receiving a legitimate negative feedback from a DT member gets you removed automatically without pay from campaign.• Alt accounts aren't welcomed in campaign, abusers caught will be punished with red tag and no payment.• Removal of signature/avatar within the week results to no payment.• Each payment will be sent directly to your bech32 BTC address by Brainboss Management Service on Tuesday, (Week will run from 12:00 AM Tuesday ends Monday 10:00 PM (Forum time).This Campaign will be open for Snr Members+.• Betplay.io reserves the right to stop or alter this campaign at any time.Payouts and Positions:10x Sr. Members - $50/week15x Hero/Legendary Members - $70/week Application Format:Code: Bitcointalk Username:Current post count (Including this one):bech32 BTC Address:Merit in the last 120 days:AvatarLink : https://imgur.com/BLeX7tcSignaturesHero comments.body: Updates:👉 Read Rules & requirements before enrolling in campaign, previous promoters aren't entitled to fill slots as this is more of a new campaign with different rules. 👉 Weekly funds are Escrowed by Brainboss Management Service.👉 Campaign to last a minimum of 4 weeks, after then status (extension or closure) of campaign will be communicated.
